remarks: The constant zero linear function between two modules.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
0lmhm.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` N ) $.
0lmhm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
0lmhm.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` M ) $.
0lmhm.t $e |- T = ( Scalar ` N ) $.
0lmhm $p |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ N e. LMod /\ S = T ) -> ( B X. { .0. } ) e. ( M LMHom N ) ) $.
